sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Quaker Houghton declares $0.508 quarterly dividend
feed.summary: Quaker Houghton (NYSE:KWR) announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.508 per share, payable on April 30, 2026, to shareholders of record as of April 16, 2026. This comes after Quaker Chemical Corporation reported a Q4 EPS miss but exceeded revenue expectations, leading Jefferies to raise its price target to $203 with a Buy rating. The content is AI-generated and editor-reviewed.

feed.title: Global Net Lease 2025 Financial Results: Q4 FFO $66.2M, Annual Revenue $495.3M - News and Statistics
feed.summary: Global Net Lease Inc. announced its Q4 2025 financial results, reporting funds from operations (FFO) of $66.2 million (29 cents per share) and revenue of $117 million. For the full year 2025, the company achieved FFO of $221 million and an annual revenue of $495.3 million. The real estate investment trust forecasts its full-year FFO for the upcoming period to be between 80 and 84 cents per share.

feed.title: What Insights Analyst Forecasts Provide on Genius Sports Limited (GENI) Q4 Performance Indicators
feed.summary: Analysts expect Genius Sports Limited (GENI) to report Q4 earnings of $0.02 per share, a 166.7% increase year-over-year, with revenue projected at $235.52 million, up 34.2%. The EPS consensus estimate was recently revised downward by 17.6%. While segment-specific revenue forecasts show strong growth in Betting Technology (27%) and Media Technology (82.9%), Sports Technology is anticipated to slightly decline.

feed.title: Banco Santander SA (ADR): Quiet Chart, Big Shifts Behind the Scenes for US Investors
feed.summary: Banco Santander's ADR appears stable, but underlying factors like European rate cuts, Latin American credit risk, and the bank's capital strategies are reshaping its long-term earnings trajectory for US investors. The article highlights how Santander provides global diversification but emphasizes that its performance is influenced by central bank policies, FX fluctuations, and emerging market risks, rather than solely by US financial dynamics. It suggests that while the bank trades at a discount compared to US peers, investors should consider its hybrid European-Latin American exposure, dividend potential, and sensitivity to macro events.

feed.title: Intchains Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ICG) Posts Steep Q4 Loss Amid Crypto Market Volatility
feed.summary: Intchains Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ICG) reported a significant Q4 2025 loss and missed analyst expectations due to cryptocurrency market volatility and declining demand for its mining hardware. The company recorded a net loss of RMB 130.7 million, largely impacted by a sharp decline in the value of its Ethereum holdings. Moving forward, Intchains plans to pivot strategically by launching a Proof-of-Stake platform, optimizing costs, expanding overseas sales, and developing new products.

feed.title: Nancy Pelosi Among 'Best Of The Best' In Stock Trading: New Congress Trading ETF Coming From Creator Of Anti-Cathie Wood, Jim Cramer Funds
feed.summary: Matthew Tuttle, known for launching ETFs that bet against Jim Cramer and Cathie Wood, is introducing a new exchange-traded fund (ETF) called the Tuttle Capital Congressional Trading ETF (NPEL). This ETF will actively invest in equities bought by members of Congress and their spouses, including focusing on high-performing traders like Nancy Pelosi, who Tuttle deems among the "best of the best." The fund aims to differentiate itself from existing congressional trading ETFs by selecting a more concentrated portfolio of around 50 stocks based on the historical performance and committee assignments of Congress members.

feed.title: From Consultation to Resolution with AI"... KT Unveils "Agentic AICC" for the First Time at MWC
feed.summary: KT Corporation is set to unveil its new "Agentic AICC" service at MWC26, an autonomous AI solution designed to revolutionize customer consultation and problem-solving for businesses. This next-generation AI contact center utilizes multiple AI agents and a "KT Agent Connector" based on large language models to automate and complete entire customer interaction processes, significantly reducing platform build time. The company aims to expand its application to personalized work processing and customized marketing, enhancing customer value.

feed.title: Bank of America Maintains Buy on eBay Inc. (EBAY) Feb 26, 2026
feed.summary: Bank of America Securities maintained a Buy rating on eBay Inc. (EBAY) on February 26, 2026, citing the company's focus on growth but without issuing a new price target. Despite the positive analyst sentiment, the stock experienced a -2.78% dip after the announcement. This maintained rating is seen as a confirmation of eBay's growth strategy for investors, rather than a short-term catalyst, with artificial intelligence tools like Meyka AI rating EBAY with a B+ grade based on various financial metrics and comparisons.

feed.title: Sysco Labor Deal And Local Sourcing Push Weigh On Valuation Story
feed.summary: Sysco has finalized a new five-year collective bargaining agreement with over 225 drivers and warehouse workers in Montana and is launching a "Home Grown by Sysco" program nationwide to source local food. These initiatives could impact the company's operational costs, supply chain efficiency, and customer relationships. While the stock is currently flagged as undervalued and trades near analyst targets, investors should monitor how these strategic shifts affect Sysco's financial performance, particularly given existing concerns about debt coverage by operating cash flow.

feed.title: Lucid Group (NASDAQ:LCID) Stock Price Down 5.6% - Time to Sell?
feed.summary: Lucid Group's (NASDAQ:LCID) stock price dropped 5.6% to $10.00, with trading volume 25% below average. This decline comes amidst several analyst downgrades, including Morgan Stanley moving to "underweight" with a $10 target and Cantor Fitzgerald trimming its target to $14. The consensus rating from MarketBeat for LCID is "Reduce" with an average price target of $19.71, highlighting concerns about its valuation and fundamental metrics like its negative PE ratio and high debt-to-equity.

feed.title: RTX (NYSE:RTX) Trading Up 2.4% - Here's Why
feed.summary: RTX (NYSE:RTX) saw its stock price climb 2.4% to $202.40 on Friday, with trading volume significantly higher than average after beating quarterly expectations for both EPS and revenue. The company also announced a quarterly dividend of $0.68 and provided strong FY2026 guidance, leading analysts to maintain a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating. Despite significant insider selling over the past three months, institutional investors hold a large stake, with Norges Bank making a substantial new investment.

feed.title: Qualcomm (NASDAQ:QCOM) Shares Down 2.2% - Time to Sell?
feed.summary: Qualcomm (QCOM) shares dropped 2.2% to $142.36, trading below their 50-day and 200-day moving averages, with a consensus analyst rating of "Hold" and a price target of $168.48. Despite beating Q1 earnings and revenue estimates and providing Q2 guidance, insiders have sold shares totaling $7.8 million recently. Institutions, however, still own a significant 74% of the stock, while the company maintains a quarterly dividend of $0.89.

feed.title: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) Shares Down 1.4% - Time to Sell?
feed.summary: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) shares dropped 1.4% on Friday, with high trading volume and a significant increase in short interest indicating potential near-term volatility. Despite strong earnings, analyst price target raises due to AI and infrastructure demand, and a "Moderate Buy" consensus, the stock trades at a high valuation, and recent insider selling is notable. The article discusses mixed sentiment for CAT, with positive factors like AI-related demand balanced against increased bearish positioning and high valuation.

feed.title: MarketAxess (MKTX) Appoints William Quan as CTO to Drive Platform Innovation
feed.summary: MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: MKTX) has appointed William Quan as its new Chief Technology Officer. Quan will lead the company's global technology organization, focusing on driving innovation, modernizing electronic trading platforms, and integrating AI and advanced data analytics. His appointment underscores MarketAxess's commitment to staying competitive in the evolving fixed-income market.

feed.title: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) Trading Up 2.7% - Here's Why
feed.summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) shares rose 2.7% during mid-day trading following a revenue beat in its latest quarterly results, despite an EPS miss. Analysts have increased their price targets for LMT, though MarketBeat's consensus rating remains "Hold" with an average target of $612.50. The company also declared a quarterly dividend of $3.45 per share, representing a 2.1% yield.

feed.title: Lemonade (LMND) Reports Record Gross Profit and 53% Revenue Growth in Q4 2025
feed.summary: Lemonade (LMND) reported strong Q4 2025 earnings with a 31% increase in in-force premiums and 53% revenue growth, reaching $228 million. The company achieved a record gross profit of $111 million and significantly narrowed its adjusted EBITDA loss to $5 million. A key innovation was the launch of ‘Lemonade Autonomous Car,’ a telematics-based product for Teslas that prices risk dynamically based on driving mode.

feed.title: How Domino’s pulled ahead in the challenged pizza segment
feed.summary: While major competitors like Papa Johns and Pizza Hut are struggling with declining sales, potential sales, and store closures, Domino's has managed to thrive. The company achieved 3.7% same-store sales growth in Q4 2025 by embracing third-party delivery, implementing creative discounting strategies, and executing a successful brand refresh. This proactive and streamlined approach has solidified Domino's position as a leader in the turbulent pizza segment.

feed.title: Why Synchrony Financial (SYF) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
feed.summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) shares dropped 7.1% today, driven by investor concerns over artificial intelligence's impact on employment after Block announced significant workforce reductions. This fear, coupled with hotter-than-expected inflation data for January and rising credit risk anxieties, contributed to a broader sell-off in credit-sensitive financial companies. Additionally, lingering concerns from a past proposal by Donald Trump to cap credit card interest rates continue to affect investor sentiment in the sector.

feed.title: Why LandBridge Company LLC Class A Is Sliding
feed.summary: LandBridge Company LLC Class A (LB) is experiencing stock volatility, potentially due to its 2026 adjusted EBITDA projection ($205 million to $225 million) falling short of investor expectations. Despite this, Barclays raised its price target to $75 with an Equal Weight rating, and management increased the quarterly dividend and approved share repurchases, signaling confidence in the company's long-term financial health.

feed.title: Walton Family Trust trims Walmart (WMT) stake with 1.72M-share sale
feed.summary: The Walton Family Holdings Trust, a major shareholder of Walmart Inc., reported net sales of 1,723,236 shares of common stock in late February 2026. These open-market sales occurred at weighted average prices between $127 and $128 per share. Additionally, the trust distributed 303,000 shares to a beneficiary for no consideration, and following these transactions, the trust still holds over 522 million Walmart shares directly.

feed.title: [144] AMERICAN TOWER CORP /MA/ SEC Filing
feed.summary: This article reports on an SEC Form 144 filing by AMERICAN TOWER CORP /MA/ (AMT), indicating a proposed sale of securities. The filing details the securities to be sold, their acquisition, and the parties involved. The article also provides relevant company information, recent news, and other SEC filings for American Tower Corp.

feed.title: Coca-Cola will celebrate 100 years in Mexico by investing US $6 billion
feed.summary: Coca-Cola plans to invest $6 billion in the Mexican market, coinciding with its 100th anniversary of operations in the country. This investment and a strong marketing strategy tied to Mexico hosting the 2026 FIFA World Cup are intended to counter recent tax increases on sugary drinks. Coca-Cola FEMSA's CEO noted that the company is optimizing its structure and capital expenditure to manage fiscal challenges and promote brands through digital and revenue management initiatives.

feed.title: Hormel appoints company’s First Chief Technology Officer
feed.summary: Hormel Foods has appointed Donald Monk as its first Chief Technology Officer, effective March 23. Monk will be responsible for the company's enterprise technology, digital, and data strategy to support long-term growth. With over 35 years of global technology leadership experience, including roles at General Mills and Cargill, Monk will play a critical role in modernizing Hormel's technology and data platforms.

feed.title: Headache? Fatigue? You Must Be Doomscrolling BDC News
feed.summary: The article discusses the recent earnings reports from business development companies (BDCs), noting that investors have not reacted positively to the news. It suggests that the negative sentiment surrounding BDCs is causing distress among investors.

feed.title: Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) EVP logs 6,851-share 401(k) rebalancing move
feed.summary: Arthur C. Butcher, an EVP at Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX), reported a discretionary rebalancing within his 401(k) plan, involving the acquisition of 6,851 common shares at $75.76 each. This transaction, classified under Rule 16b-3(f), was a plan-related allocation rather than a typical market trade. Following this, Butcher indirectly holds 20,205 shares in his 401(k) and directly holds 55,792 shares of Boston Scientific stock.

feed.title: Crown Castle Insider Sold Shares Worth $401,481, According to a Recent SEC Filing
feed.summary: An insider at Crown Castle Inc. sold shares valued at $401,481, as disclosed in a recent SEC filing. This transaction was reported by MT Newswires on February 27, 2026. This news follows several analyst adjustments to Crown Castle's price target earlier in February.

feed.title: [8-K] PINNACLE WEST CAPITAL CORP Reports Material Event | PNW SEC Filing - Form 8-K
feed.summary: Pinnacle West Capital Corporation (PNW) and its subsidiary Arizona Public Service Company (APS) filed an 8-K detailing their plans for March 2026 investor meetings. The companies outlined a long-term EPS growth target of 5-7% supported by a significant capital program of $10.35 billion for APS from 2025-2028, focusing on system reliability, new gas generation, nuclear investment, and transmission projects. The filing also discusses a 2025 APS rate case requesting a $580 million net revenue increase and an optimized financing plan including equity issuance and debt to maintain investment-grade credit ratings.

feed.title: Retirement Industry People Moves
feed.summary: This article details recent personnel changes within the retirement industry. Key moves include Kevin Murphy joining Broadridge as VP of retirement solutions, Angela Rodell becoming a senior adviser at Star Mountain Capital, Erin Secord joining Dorsey & Whitney's healthcare litigation group, Amanda Hines Gold becoming a partner at Davis Polk, and Jack Moody and Mark Nicholas joining Employee Fiduciary. These appointments highlight shifts in leadership and expertise across various segments of the retirement sector.

feed.title: 16,811 RSUs awarded to Crown Castle (NYSE: CCI) EVP & COO-Towers
feed.summary: Catherine Piche, EVP & COO-Towers of Crown Castle Inc. (NYSE: CCI), was granted 16,811 Time RSUs on February 25, 2026, as reported in a recent SEC Form 4 filing. These RSUs, representing a contingent right to receive one share of common stock, will vest over three years, with 33 1/3% vesting annually starting in February 2027, subject to continued employment. This grant is part of the company's 2022 Long-Term Incentive Plan.

feed.title: PPG Industries Files For Mixed Shelf Offering, Size Not Disclosed
feed.summary: PPG Industries has filed for a mixed shelf offering, according to a report from Reuters. The specific size of the offering was not disclosed in the filing. This news is a brief update from Refinitiv regarding PPG's financial strategy.

feed.title: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) Shares Up 2.2% - Should You Buy?
feed.summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) saw its shares trade up 2.2% on Friday, closing at $49.98. The company is undergoing a transformation to expand fiber and cut costs, which management expects to deliver billions in annual savings and support margin improvement. Despite positive developments like a dividend increase to a 5.7% yield and strategic acquisitions, investor concerns have risen due to a major insider stock sale by Director Hans Erik Vestberg and a significant jump in short interest.

feed.title: Globe Life (NYSE: GL) EVP gets stock grants and tax share disposition
feed.summary: Globe Life (NYSE: GL) Executive Vice President Jennifer Allison Haworth reported receiving stock grants and a tax-related share disposition. She was granted 9,100 employee stock options and 7,822 shares of common stock, with 2,755 shares disposed of at $144.15 each to cover tax liabilities. The transaction was classified as a payment of tax liability through share delivery rather than an open-market sale.

feed.title: AES Corp expected to post earnings of 60 cents a share - Earnings Preview
feed.summary: AES Corp is anticipated to report earnings of 60 cents per share. This earnings preview is based on information from Refinitiv and Reuters. The full article provides only this financial expectation.

feed.title: American Tower Sets 2026 Performance-Based Executive Compensation Plan
feed.summary: American Tower (AMT) has established its 2026 performance-based executive compensation plan, setting base salaries and bonus targets for its top executives. CEO Steven O. Vondran will receive a $1 million salary with a 200% bonus target, while other executives have salaries ranging from $605,000 to $706,200 with 125% bonus targets. This plan emphasizes linking executive pay to company financial metrics and individual performance goals.

feed.title: Coffee Holding Restructures CEO Pay With Long-Term Incentive
feed.summary: Coffee Holding Co (JVA) has restructured its CEO Andrew Gordon's compensation, drastically cutting his annual salary from $325,000 to $80,000. In return, Gordon is eligible for a $1.6 million incentive bonus if he remains with the company until January 1, 2030, with payment by March 16, 2030, and any severance benefits now require a general release. This strategic move aims to retain the CEO long-term while reducing immediate salary obligations, reflecting a shift towards cost management and leadership stability.

feed.title: GE HealthCare Establishes New 364-Day Revolving Credit Facility
feed.summary: GE HealthCare Technologies Inc. (GEHC) has established a new $0.5 billion, 364-day senior unsecured revolving credit facility, maturing on February 25, 2027. This facility, which replaces a similar previous agreement, enhances the company's short-term liquidity, provides multi-currency borrowing options, and includes standard financial covenants. While an analyst recently rated GEHC a Buy with a $105.00 price target, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, Spark, assesses GEHC as Neutral due to mixed financial performance tempered by a strong balance sheet and positive 2026 guidance.

feed.title: Landmark Bancorp (NASDAQ: LARK) replaces Crowe with Forvis Mazars as auditor
feed.summary: Landmark Bancorp (NASDAQ: LARK) has appointed Forvis Mazars, LLP as its new independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2026, commencing with the first-quarter review. This decision follows a competitive selection process by the Audit Committee. Crowe LLP was dismissed as the previous auditor, effective upon completion of the company’s 2025 audits, with no reported disagreements or reportable events noted during their tenure.

feed.title: IDEXX Laboratories Executive Sells Shares
feed.summary: Nimrata Hunt, Executive Vice President at IDEXX Laboratories, sold 2,693 shares of common stock on February 26, 2026, for a total of $1,781,530. Following this transaction, Hunt's direct ownership in the company is 19,898 shares, with an additional 160 shares owned indirectly. This information is based on an SEC Form 4 filing.

feed.title: AbbVie Executive Sells Over $5 Million in Company Stock
feed.summary: Perry C Siatis, EVP, GC AND SECRETARY of AbbVie (ABBV), recently sold 22,381 shares of company stock for a total of $5,147,630 at a price of $230.0 per share. After this transaction, Siatis directly owns 38,137 shares of AbbVie common stock. This insider trading information was reported in a Form 4 SEC filing on February 27, 2026.

feed.title: Stock grant lifts Leggett & Platt (LEG) director shareholdings
feed.summary: Leggett & Platt (LEG) director Joseph W. McClanathan received a stock grant of 13,674 shares of common stock, valued at $0.00 per share, as equity-based compensation. This transaction increased his direct holdings to 119,566.8157 shares. The grant aligns the director's financial interests with the company's share performance and was filed as a Form 4.

feed.summary: Crown Castle director Kevin T. Kabat was awarded 2,673 shares of common stock on February 25, 2026, as part of his non-employee director compensation under the company’s 2022 Long-Term Incentive Plan. This grant, with no cash paid per share, increases his direct holdings to 9,149 shares. The transaction was reported in an SEC Form 4 filing, indicating it was a stock grant rather than a market purchase.

feed.title: Leggett & Platt (LEG) director receives 13,674-share equity grant
feed.summary: Leggett & Platt director Maryelizabeth R. Campbell received a grant of 13,674 shares of common stock on February 26, 2026, as reported in an SEC Form 4 filing. This equity grant was valued at $0.00 per share, indicating a compensatory award rather than a purchase. Following this transaction, Campbell directly holds a total of 63,535.5718 shares of Leggett & Platt common stock.

feed.title: eBay Inc (San Jose) WARN Act Investigation
feed.summary: Strauss Borrelli PLLC is investigating eBay, Inc. for a potential violation of the WARN Act following a mass layoff of 243 employees in San Jose, California, announced on February 25, 2026. The law firm believes affected employees may be entitled to 60 days of severance pay and benefits if eBay failed to provide the required 60-day notice. The WARN Act mandates that employers with 100 or more employees give 60 days' notice for significant layoffs or plant closings.

feed.title: Keros Therapeutics Adds Veteran Finance Leader to Board
feed.summary: Keros Therapeutics (KROS) has appointed Charles Newton, former CFO of Lyell Immunopharma and a veteran healthcare investment banker, as a Class III director, effective March 9, 2026. Newton will also join the Compensation and Audit Committees, bringing extensive financial and capital markets expertise to support Keros's clinical pipeline. This appointment coincides with long-serving director Carl Gordon stepping down from the board.

feed.title: Equity awards boost Hilton (NYSE: HLT) executive Laura Fuentes’ holdings
feed.summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings executive Laura Fuentes received equity awards on February 25, 2026, including 6,227 employee stock options and 10,964 shares of common stock, as part of her compensation package. These awards, granted at $0.00 per share, consisted of fully vested performance-based units and new units and options set to vest in annual installments starting in March 2027. The transactions were reported in a Form 4 SEC filing, indicating an increase in her direct holdings in the company.

feed.title: Raymond James Maintained Strong Buy for nLIGHT, Inc. (LASR) Feb 2026
feed.summary: Raymond James reaffirmed its "Strong Buy" rating for nLIGHT, Inc. (LASR) on February 27, 2026, and increased its price target to $75, citing improved margins and product mix. This positive outlook is supported by recent share strength, with a 12.03% price change since the previous analyst note. Meyka AI gives LASR a B+ grade, suggesting above-average prospects compared to peers based on growth and momentum metrics.

feed.title: Bloomberg: Ed Huang on the Continued Growth in Asia
feed.summary: Ed Huang, Head of Asia-Pacific for Blackstone Private Wealth Solutions, discusses the ongoing growth and emerging opportunities within the Asian market. The article highlights his insights on the region's expanding economic landscape. This brief piece was published by Blackstone on February 27, 2026.

feed.title: 771,607 Royal Caribbean (RCL) shares sold by AWILHELMSEN AS entity
feed.summary: An entity named AWILHELMSEN AS sold 771,607 Royal Caribbean (RCL) common stock shares between February 25-27, 2026, as reported in an SEC Form 4 filing for director Arne Alexander Wilhelmsen. After these transactions, 16,435,910 shares are indirectly held, including holdings by AWILHELMSEN AS and AWILHELMSEN ASSET MANAGEMENT AS. The reporting person disclaims beneficial ownership of the indirectly held shares, except to the extent of his pecuniary interest.

feed.title: Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust (BSTT) appoints new CFO and Treasurer
feed.summary: Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust, Inc. (BSTT) has appointed Paul Kolodziej as its new Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer, effective February 27, 2026. Kolodziej, previously Deputy CFO, Chief Accounting Officer, and Controller for the company, replaces Anthony Marone, who will continue as Global Head of Real Estate Finance for Blackstone. The appointment was disclosed via an 8-K SEC filing, noting Kolodziej's extensive prior experience within Blackstone Real Estate.
